import com.atlassian.crowd.embedded.api.User import com.atlassian.jira.user.util.UserManager import com.atlassian.jira.util.ImportUtils import com.atlassian.jira.ComponentManager
ComponentManager componentManager = ComponentManager.getInstance() com.atlassian.crowd.embedded.api.User currentUser = ComponentManager.instance.jiraAuthenticationContext.getLoggedInUser() def userUtil = componentManager.getUserUtil()
!userUtil.getGroupNamesForUser(currentUser.name).contains("HS-customers") && !issue.getProjectObject().name.contains("Backend ")

function.arg:
Status of the request $issue.summary with key $issue has been changed...
HUB Support Portal - Support Request Reference: $issue

$issue.summary Expired - Too much time without hearing anything from you
Dear $issue.reporter.name,
We have noticed that this issue has not been updated for a period of 7 days.

We will assume that this issue is resolved and close the ticket. If you still need help, just comment on the case via the web portal and we will reopen the case. If you've managed to resolve this issue locally, please take a moment to share your solution for future reference.
Kind Regards,
HUB Support Team
You can view the full request

Details

Brand <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(componentManager.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObject("customfield_12900"))%>
